title: 100 years of Australian football
creator_credit: David Barham, Neil Kearney, Seven Network Limited (Australia), Australian Football League and Visual Entertainment Group
brief_description: For lovers of the great game of Australian Rules Football, this documentary highlights the game’s magnificent 100 year history. Using archival footage and interviews, the legends of the game including the great Jack Dyer and Mr. Football himself, Ted Whitten are featured together with many past and present heroes.
